Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Number of times 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs after 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Percentage of process variants containing 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' that eventually lead to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' following 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' that are immediately followed by 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' appears more than once in the same case
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' occurring in variants that include 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' in cases with total amount above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' that occur within rework loops involving at least two rejection steps
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' events that precede a successful approval path ending in 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Payment Handled' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants starting with 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and containing 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' that also contain 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' that are part of cycles triggered by 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' events that directly follow any rejection by a role other than the employee (e.g., 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION', 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR', 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER', 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER', or 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING')
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities

Name: Percentage of all rejections in the log that are 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Average number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' occurrences per case in variants that include 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Fraction of cases containing 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' that also contain 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of times 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs without being followed by a resubmission ('Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE') within the same case
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' does not occur

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' that occur in domestic declaration reimbursement processes (inferred from presence of 'Request Payment' without prior multi-level approvals)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' in 2018 compared to 2017
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities
